context_for_next_testing_agent: Mobile responsiveness fixes for Unatienda admin module verified working. Key responsive patterns: (1) overflow-x-auto scrollbar-hide on containers with shrink-0 on children for horizontal scroll, (2) min-w-max on inner flex containers to prevent wrapping, (3) min-w-[640px] on table for forced horizontal scroll, (4) space-y-2 sm:space-y-0 for stacked-to-inline toolbar, (5) flex-1 min-w-0 sm:max-w-sm for full-width search on mobile. Login via API returns 'token' key (not 'access_token').
